headline: GTA Online
subtitle: Overtime Shootout
content: Overtime is an Adversary Mode that’s all about accuracy and finesse. Like a good old-fashioned game of darts, it’s all about positioning yourself in the high scoring bands with surgical precision to win the most points. Except instead of a dart it’s you, strapped into a parachute-equipped car. And the scoreboard is hundreds of feet up in the sky. And the only way to get to it is to achieve a whole lot of air time. Buckle up.
